message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 2-a-1, translated into en
data: The quality of the data may vary considerably among countries, as not all of them apply the COFOG classification. In such cases, FAO seeks to validate reported aggregates against fiscal data published by national authorities' websites. Since 2012, the FAO Statistics Division also fields a detailed annual questionnaire on Government Expenditure on Agriculture that is pre-populated with key major aggregates reported to the IMF or identified by FAO. Where reported details diverge significantly from the pre-populated aggregates, queries are sent to national counterparts, to ensure the methodological quality, objectivity and reliability of the data submitted by countries.
